biotools.summary: Learning a mixture of microbial networks using minorization-maximization | "MixMPLN" is a package written in R, which has two features. First feature is generating a proper synthetic sample-taxa count matrix. Second feature is receiving a sample-taxa count matrix and extracting k(number of components) different interaction networks between taxa | Following packages must be installed and loaded in R environment before using "MixMPLN":

bioschemas.name: MixMPLN
